content:
1. Tahoe Rim Trail: This 165-mile trail circles Lake Tahoe and offers breathtaking views of the lake and surrounding mountains.

2. Mount Tallac Trail: This challenging 10.4-mile hike rewards hikers with stunning vistas of Lake Tahoe and the surrounding Desolation Wilderness.

3. Eagle Falls Trail: This moderate 2.3-mile hike takes hikers to Eagle Falls and Eagle Lake, with stunning views of Emerald Bay.

4. Rubicon Trail: This 22.5-mile trail runs along the western shore of Lake Tahoe and offers stunning views of the crystal-clear water.

5. Shirley Canyon Trail: This 6-mile trail takes hikers through a rugged canyon to Shirley Lake and offers stunning views of Squaw Valley.

6. Donner Lake Rim Trail: This 23-mile trail offers stunning views of Donner Lake and the surrounding mountains.

7. Granite Chief Wilderness: This 25-mile trail takes hikers through the heart of the Granite Chief Wilderness and offers stunning views of the Sierra Nevada Mountains.

8. Tahoe City Lakeside Trail: This 3-mile paved trail runs along the shore of Lake Tahoe and offers stunning views of the lake and surrounding mountains.
